name: So Far Away
tuning: E A D G B E

Play it in standard (EADGBE) or Drop D (DADGBE). Which ever sounds better to you.

as i think some of the Bm chords are supposed to be Bsus4 
chords. During most of the D major chords in this song, 
he does a little fill on the high E while keeping the rest 
of the chord fretted.
 e)--2-2-2-3-2-0<<.. Like that.

guitar (12 string i think), he uses some different voicings 
to create a melody... I believe those voicings are mostly 
sus4 chords.

AWAY IN A MANGER CHORDS

Standard (EADGBE) Tuning
Capo fret 2 (if necessary)

   [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]G7[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]
Away in a manger, No crib for a bed,

        [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
The little Lord Jesus, Lay down his sweet head.

       [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]G7[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
The stars in the bright sky, Looked down where he lay

     [ch]D7[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]       [ch]D7[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]
The little Lord Jesus, Asleep on the hay.


        *Follow the same chord pattern for the rest of the song...


The cattle a-lowing, the baby awakes;
But little Lord Jesus, No crying he makes.
I love thee, Lord Jesus, Look down from the sky,
And stay by my bedside, 'Till morning is nigh.

Be near me Lord Jesus, I ask thee to stay,
Close by me forever, and love me I pray.
Bless all the dear children, in thy tender care,
And fit us for heaven, to live with thee there.

This is my first tab!
i love this song and i was searching on the web for chords and it was wrong!
so i decided to find them out and share them with everyone else who loves katy perry!
enjoy playing this song! :)

[Standard Tuning]


[Verse]

[ch]E[/ch]
Summer after high school when we first met
[ch]G#m[/ch]
We make out in you mustang to Radiohead
    [ch]C#m[/ch]                                        [ch]A[/ch]
And on my 18th birthday we bought matching tattoos
        [ch]E[/ch]
Used to steal your parent's liquor and climb to the roof
[ch]G#m[/ch]
Talk about our future like we had a clue
      [ch]C#m[/ch]                                [ch]A[/ch]
Never planned that one day I'd be losing you


[Chorus]

            [ch]E[/ch]                   [ch]G#m[/ch]
In another life I would be your girl
                [ch]C#m[/ch]                        [ch]A[/ch]
We keep all our promises be us against the world
            [ch]E[/ch]                    [ch]G#m[/ch]
In another life I would make you stay
                   [ch]C#m[/ch]                            [ch]A[/ch]
So I don't have to say you were the one that got away
The one that got away


[Verse]

[ch]E[/ch]
I was June you were my Johnny Cash
      [ch]G#m[/ch]
Never one without the other we made a pact
[ch]C#m[/ch]                                           [ch]A[/ch]
Sometimes when I miss you I put those records on woah
[ch]E[/ch]
Someone said you had your tattoo removed
[ch]G#m[/ch]
Saw you down town singin’ the blues
     [ch]C#m[/ch]                                       [ch]A[/ch]
It's time to face the music I'm no longer your muse


[Chorus]

            [ch]E[/ch]                   [ch]G#m[/ch]
In another life I would be your girl
                [ch]C#m[/ch]                        [ch]A[/ch]
We keep all our promises be us against the world

In another life I would make you stay
                   [ch]C#m[/ch]                            [ch]A[/ch]
So I don't have to say you were the one that got away
The one that got away


[Bridge]

[ch]E[/ch]         [ch]G#m[/ch]         [ch]C#m[/ch]         [ch]A[/ch]
  The one     the one     the one   the one that got away

[ch]B[/ch]                              [ch]C#m[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch]
  All his money can't buy me a time machine no
[ch]B[/ch]                          [ch]C#m[/ch]         [ch]A[/ch]
  Can't replace you with a million rings no
[ch]B[/ch]                             [ch]C#m[/ch]       [ch]A[/ch]
  I shoulda told you what you meant to me woah
[ch]B[/ch]
